label: Books We Love: Cookbooks and Food
description: Indulge your culinary passions with NPR's Books We Love program. This selection of cookbooks and food-related books offers a delicious array of recipes, tips, and stories to inspire your kitchen adventures.

list.label: (Serious) New Cook: Recipes, Tips, and Techniques
A Good Day to Bake: Simple Baking Recipes for Every Mood
The Art of Pantry Cooking: Meals for Family and Friends
Art of the Chicken: A Master Chef's Paintings, Stories, and Recipes of the Humble Bird
Chinese-Ish: Home Cooking Not Quite Authentic, 100% Delicious
Colu Cooks: Easy Fancy Food
Delicious Gatherings: Recipes to Celebrate Together
Fabulous Modern Cookies: Lessons in Better Baking for Next-Generation Treats
Fix Me a Plate: Traditional and New School Soul Food Recipes from Scotty Scott of Cook Drank Eat
Gullah Geechee Home Cooking: Recipes from the Matriarch of Edisto Island
I Am From Here: Stories and Recipes From a Southern Chef
Korean American: Food That Tastes Like Home
Koshersoul: The Faith and Food Journey of an African American Jew
Masa: Techniques, Recipes, and Reflections on a Timeless Staple
Mi Cocina: Recipes and Rapture From My Kitchen in Mexico
Milk Street: The World in a Skillet
Ottolenghi Test Kitchen: Extra Good Things
Persiana Everyday
Plant-Based India: Nourishing Recipes Rooted in Tradition
Search: A Novel
Smitten Kitchen Keepers: New Classics for Your Forever Files: A Cookbook
Turkey and the Wolf: Flavor Trippin' in New Orleans
The Wok: Recipes and Techniques
The Woks of Life: Recipes to Know and Love from a Chinese American Family: A Cookbook
